code: @Bean public Employee employee() {     Employee employee = new Employee().     employee.setName("John Smith").     employee.setAge(42).     employee.setCompany("Acme Widgets, Inc.").     return employee. }

@Test public void verifyEmployeeSetFromBaseContextConfig() {     assertNotNull("The employee field should have been autowired.", this.employee).     assertEquals("John Smith", this.employee.getName()). }
